content.text:
# Russian Gold Basket awards__disambig_1

The Russian Gold Basket awards were given annually out by the Russian Basketball Federation (RBF) from 2004 to 2009.
Russian Gold Basket winners
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;font-size:85%"
!width="150"|Year||width="146"|2004||width="146"|2005||width="146"|2006||width="152"|2007||width="152"|2008||width="166"|2009

|-
